quests.desc: Welcome to another life changing session of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be great if you could make an effort to travel south. Next, go west. And then, recover the hat from the floor of the attic. Got that? Good!

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an attic. A standard one.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You are in a cellar. A standard kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the canteen.

 You see a cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a fridge.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a bowl. [if there is something on the s_0]On the bowl you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've seen better studios, but at least this one seems pretty standard.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
I never took you for the sort of person who would show up in a closet, but I guess I was wrong. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You see a workbench. [if there is something on the s_1]On the workbench you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You are in a dish-pit. A standard kind of place.

 You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] freezer.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a case.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The case contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The case is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a saucepan. The saucepan is typical.[if there is something on the s_2] On the saucepan you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 Hey, want to see a coffer? Look over there, a coffer, so there's that.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a trunk.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Wow, check out the price tag glued to the trunk! Thirty dollars![end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've come into a typical room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be typical. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the basement. The room is well lit.

 [if c_6 is locked]A locked[else if c_6 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] suitcase is right there by you.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_6], so there's that.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookhouse. A normal one.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a chamber.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: fridge
infos.desc: The fridge looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: freezer
infos.desc: The freezer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: coffer
infos.desc: The coffer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: suitcase
infos.desc: The suitcase looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: hat
infos.desc: The hat seems well matched to everything else here

infos.name: bowl
infos.desc: The bowl is unstable.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is balanced.

infos.name: saucepan
infos.desc: The saucepan is shaky.

infos.name: spork
infos.desc: The spork is expensive looking.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, travel south. And then, go to the west. With that done, recover the hat from the floor of the attic. That's it!
